title: Laugfs to supply domestic LP gas within next 6 days
body_lines: Laugfs Gas PLC, one of the main liquefied petroleum gas suppliers in Sri Lanka, says the company will be able to supply domestic LP gas cylinders to the market within the next six days.
Laugfs Chairman W.K.H. Wegapitiya said the company was able to open letters of credit for the purchase of LP gas.
